class.name: OScriptNodeWhile
class.brief_description: Provides a simple while-loop based on a condition.
class.description: The [OScriptNodeWhile] node continuously executes the logic connected to the [param repeat] output pin while the [param condition] input pin is [code]true[/code]. When the [param condition] input pin is [code]false[/code], the while loop exits through the [param done] output pin.
